Wisdom: اعْتَرِمْ [اغترم‏] بِالشِّدَّةِ حِينَ لَا يُغْنِي عَنْكَ إِلَّا الشِّدَّةُ
enWisdom: Be intent on [braving] difficulty when nothing will free you except difficulty
The root of determination is judiciousness, and its fruit is victory
When you are appointed as a deputy, then be resolute [in fulfilling your obligation]

Wisdom: إِذَا عَقَدْتُمْ عَلَى عَزَائِمِ خَيْرٍ فَأَمْضُوهَا
enWisdom: When you make the intention of doing good, then execute it

Wisdom: تَدَاوَ مِنْ دَاءِ الْفَتْرَةِ فِي قَلْبِكَ بِعَزِيمَةٍ وَمِنْ كَرَى الْغَفْلَةِ فِي نَاظِرِكَ بِيَقْظَةٍ
enWisdom: Cure the ailment of lassitude in your heart through determination and the slumber of negligence in your eyes through alertness
Whoever reveals his decision [to others], his judiciousness gets nullified

Wisdom: لَا تَعْزِمْ عَلَى مَا لَمْ تَسْتَبِنِ الرُّشْدَ فِيهِ
enWisdom: Do not resolve upon that in which you find no clear guidance
